prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a strong jaw and a playful demeanor.
I want a blue aquatic creature that has a spiky dorsal fin and loves to swim.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a crocodile, has a cheerful expression, and is great at swimming.
Make a Pokemon with a turquoise body and bright red spikes that enjoys playing in the water.
Imagine a medium-sized Pokemon with a friendly personality and a love for wetland habitats.
Design a Pokemon that combines features of both a crocodile and a playful child.
Show me a Pokemon that has a blue body, yellow belly, and a strong connection to aquatic environments.
